alert.note: Alert for Green; Taylor (Kentucky) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 14 at 9:27PM EDT by NWS Louisville
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of east central Green and central Taylor Counties through 1000 PM EDT/900 PM CDT/... At 927 PM EDT/827 PM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Campbellsville, moving east at 10 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Campbellsville around 940 PM EDT. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. Torrential rainfall is also occurring with this storm and may lead to localized flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways. Frequent cloud to ground lightning is occurring with this storm. Lightning can strike 10 miles away from a thunderstorm. Seek a safe shelter inside a building or vehicle.
